name: Endless Space (itch) (AtifDev)
description:
Hello everyone This is just my first game worked so hard on it hope you like it.

Lets see how many people can get 100 score points in the hard mode.

Shoot he asteroid's coming from the space for more controls or info go to controls section of the game on the main menu.

Install the game and extract the Endless Space.zip file , open it and launch the Endless Space.exe file and play the game  :).
